tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE indie_games_updates (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_name VARCHAR(255),
    update_version VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE,
    patch_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patch_notes (
    patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    patch_version VARCHAR(20),
    patch_date DATE,
    patch_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE game_details (
  game_id INT,
  game_name VARCHAR(50),
  release_date DATE,
  developer VARCHAR(50),
  platform VARCHAR(20)
);
